newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies eight muni issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies eight muni issues for insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp. said Monday it qualified for bond insurance the following eight municipal issues:
--Evergreen School District, Calif., $10 million general obligation bonds.
--Zeeland Public Schools, Mich., $7.59 million school building bonds.
--Hillsdale Board of Education, N.J., $3.983 million school bonds.
--Ponca City Utility Authority, Okla., $1.75 million utility system revenue bonds.
--El Paso County, Texas, $8.75 million certificates of obligation.
The firm also qualified by direct purchase Janesville, Wis.'s $9.75 million bond deal, selling on June 30.
